name: Corrupted (itch) (Oww321)
description:
Corrupted is a short and simple fighting game. You play as a knight fighting back a legion of corrupted soldiers.

Controls:

  • Moving = A and D.
  • Dodge = Space
  • Block = Shift
  • Light attack = Up arrow
  • Heavy attack/Parry = Down arrow
  • Parry = Heavy attack right before an attack lands.

I can't figure out if the game is too easy or too hard. Press M + H to get GodMode if you need it.

This game was made in a few weeks and is my first project I've worked on to completion.
